## SelectableCombinedFilter interface

A [CombinedFilter](./search-headless.combinedfilter.md) with additional information, such as an optional display name and whether or not it is selected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SelectableCombinedFilter extends CombinedFilter 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [CombinedFilter](./search-headless.combinedfilter.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [displayName?](./search-headless.selectablecombinedfilter.displayname.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The filter's display name. |
|  [selected](./search-headless.selectablecombinedfilter.selected.md) | boolean | Whether or not the filter is selected. |
